segments.text: Good morning.So this is the first day for you to work here , I hope you'll like your job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning , Ms.Wilson . I've got a lot to learn from you . I think I'll enjoy working with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope so.Now let me tell you your duties here.This is your desk.Please sit down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your main duty is to answer the phone calls and transfer them to the person wanted .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see.What if the person wanted is out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In that case , you are supposed to ask the caller to leave a message .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there anything else I should do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you are responsible for keeping all files in order .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you have any questions . I will help you .
segments.speaker: S1
